casebody.data:
Glenn WILLIAMS, et al., Plaintiffs and Appellants,
v.
The PEP BOYS MANNY MOE & JACK OF CALIFORNIA, Defendant and Respondent. A146060 Court of Appeal, First District, Division 4, California. Filed August 23, 2018

Certified for Partial Publication.*

Pursuant to California Rules of Court, rules 8.1105(b) and 8.1110, this opinion is certified for publication with the exception of parts II.A., II.B., II.D., and II.E.
